description: The two main entities on the platform are Students and Educational institutes. Thus both these entities should be treated as separate accounts (1 student profile represents one account, 1 school profile represents a separate account). Student profile can be created by a visiting users (need to provide login with facebook, linkedin, viadeo, google+) More details explained in the user profile section.
